verses.name: Job 9:2
verses.text: I know it is so of a truth: but how should man be just with God?

verses.name: Job 9:3
verses.text: If he will contend with him, he cannot answer him one of a thousand.

verses.name: Job 9:4
verses.text: He is wise in heart, and mighty in strength: who hath hardened himself against him, and hath prospered?

verses.name: Job 9:5
verses.text: Which removeth the mountains, and they know not: which overturneth them in his anger.

verses.name: Job 9:6
verses.text: Which shaketh the earth out of her place, and the pillars thereof tremble.

verses.name: Job 9:7
verses.text: Which commandeth the sun, and it riseth not; and sealeth up the stars.
